name: berlin-public-transportation
title: Berlin Public Transportation
description: Departures for Berlin public transport stations using BVG (Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe) real-time traffic data
author: arjanski

commands.name: bvg
commands.title: Departures
commands.subtitle: BVG Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe
commands.description: Search for Departures from a BVG Station

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
